Text: After the Saint Selection Ceremony concludes...

I am indebted to you once again. Thanks to you,
Lady Beatrix, the event was more successful than
anyone anticipated.

I should be the one thanking you. Besides, I had a
great time.

By the way, Lady Beatrix...do you plan on changing
your outfit?

This outfit stands out, doesn't it? I figured it
would be easier for my niece to spot me.
Well then, I should get going...

P-Please wait! Do you really intend to go out
dressed like that?

Yes. If I don't go out, how will I find my niece?
Is there some kind of problem?

No, it's just... I hear it's especially chilly today.
Please be careful.
Thank you. I will.
Now then, where to look...

Beatrix steps out of the venue, still in her Santa
outfit. A chilling breeze blows through the evening
city.

I see... It really is quite chilly. No wonder
Princess Iris warned me.

(What should I do? It will be tough roaming the
streets in this cold. I could really use something
to warm me up...)
...What is that smell...?

Glancing around, Beatrix notices a street vendor
selling soup.

Soup in this cold weather. I'm sure it will warm me
up, but...

(What a long line. I might freeze to the bone while
waiting. As for the other stalls...)
Everywhere is packed. Then again, it is the holidays.
But I really need to find a way to warm myself...
...Huh? Aren't you...
That voice...
Um... Are you okay? You look freezing in that outfit.

Heheh. It is you, after all. As you can see, I am a
bit chilly.

I thought it would be easier for my niece to
recognize me in this outfit, but I might freeze
before she finds me.

Anyway... Here, take this. It's a limited-time menu
sandwich from Tuna King. It's not exactly warm,
but...
Are you sure? Weren't you going to eat it?

I have an extra one. Besides, I can't just leave you
out here like this.
Thank you. I'll gratefully accept it then.

Cid hands Beatrix the sandwich, and she eagerly takes
a large bite.
Wow... It's delicious.
Glad to hear that.
And I'm starting to feel warm already.
Thank you for finding me. I really appreciate it.

It's no big deal. Besides, it was easy spotting you
in that outfit.

Hmm... Looks like my plan worked. Now I just need to
look for my niece

Wait, hold on. Don't you think you ought to wear
something warmer?

If you catch a cold, finding someone will be the
least of your worries. Not that I'll stop you if
you're determined to keep wearing it...

No, you're right. I'll put the outfit away for now
and save it for next time.
...You really like that outfit, don't you?

I guess. It's become a symbol to remember my time
with Princess Iris today...

Besides, even if I couldn't find who I was looking
for, you found me and even gave me a sandwich.
It's all thanks to this outfit.
Hmm... That's one way to look at it.

I also have this outfit to thank for how warm I feel
now.
Huh? But you look freezing in that.
Hehe. I guess. But...I still feel warm, nonetheless.
(Perhaps I feel warm because of your kindness...)

Beatrix gazes at the bewildered Cid and gently
smiles. Despite the undeniably cold winter wind,
her heart is flooded with feelings of warmth.
